mapper.insert: UPDATE student_course SET grade=#{grade} where stu_id=#{stu_id} and course_id=#{course_id}
mapper.select: SELECT student.stu_id, student_course.course_id, course_name, grade FROM student, student_course, course WHERE student_course.course_id = course.course_id and student.stu_id = student_course.stu_id and student.stu_id = #{stu_id}
